name: Snake (itch) (WastedHymn)
description:
This is small replica of snake game from Nokia phones. I've used CRT TV shader to give the old TV screen feeling.

CONTROLS

Movement -> WASD or Arrow keys

Camera Zoom -> Mouse Wheel

Reset -> R

Change Background Color -> E

ASSETS 

CRT Shader and TV Model -> Shader Showcase, Itch.io page and Google Drive

Room Model -> Pack Gesta Furniture
